humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that the patient has metastases in 1 out of 13 assessed lymph nodes (pN1a (1/13)). This corresponds to the N1 stage as per the AJCC staging system (New Rule 12).

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The 'pN' category in the TNM staging system refers to the involvement of regional lymph nodes. In this report, the 'pN1a (1/13)' indicates that 1 out of the 13 examined lymph nodes had metastatic cancer. Therefore, the N stage for this patient is N1.
